# ExifMetadata.ByteOrderMode property

The byte order mode used when serializing the EXIF metadata.

```csharp
public ByteOrderMode ByteOrderMode { get; set; }
```

## Remarks

This defaults to BigEndian, however when deserializing, the byte order mode defaults to what is read from the buffer.
